meanings.definition: A person who engages in risky or daring activities.
meanings.sent1: The venturers climbed the steep mountain without fear.
meanings.sent2: The group of venturers explored the mysterious cave together.
meanings.sent3: The venturers decided to skydive for fun, even though it was a bit crazy.
meanings.sent4: She was a venturer in the world of extreme sports, always seeking new challenges.
meanings.sent5: The venturers faced the roaring waves with courage and determination.

meanings.definition: Those who take risks in business or investment.
meanings.sent1: The venturers invested in the new tech startup and hoped for success.
meanings.sent2: Many venturers in the stock market closely follow market trends.
meanings.sent3: The group of venturers decided to pool their money and invest in a risky venture.
meanings.sent4: She was known as a successful venturer in the world of real estate.
meanings.sent5: The venturers carefully analyzed the market before making any investment decisions.

meanings.definition: To take a risk or embark on a daring journey.
meanings.sent1: They venturers decided to sail across the ocean in search of new lands.
meanings.sent2: She venturers into the unknown, eager to discover what lay ahead.
meanings.sent3: He venturers into the haunted house, not knowing what he would find inside.
meanings.sent4: The team venturers into the dense jungle, ready for any challenges they may face.
meanings.sent5: The explorer venturers into the uncharted territory, excited for the adventures that awaited.
